SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: USR_USP_UPSERT_ATTRIBUTEVALUE
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: Blackbaud Professional Services
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_UPSERT_ATTRIBUTEVALUE ( @RECORDTYPE_NAME nvarchar(200) --------- = 'Constituent' ,@ATTRIBUTE_NAME nvarchar(200)-------------- = 'Demo1' ,@ID uniqueidentifier----------------------- = '<guid>' ,@ATTRIBUTE_VALUE nvarchar(max)
) as begin
set nocount on;
declare @ATTRIBUTETABLENAME nvarchar(300) declare @ATTRIBUTECODETABLENAME nvarchar(300) declare @ATTRIBUTEVALUE_COLUMNNAME nvarchar(300) declare @ATTRIBUTE_IDCOLUMNNAME nvarchar(10) declare @ATTRIBUTEVALUE_XLATE nvarchar(100) declare @ONLYALLOWONE bit declare @ATTRIBUTE_DATATYPE nvarchar(max) declare @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output
select @ONLYALLOWONE=AC.ONLYALLOWONEPERRECORD ,@ATTRIBUTETABLENAME=TC.TABLENAME ,@ATTRIBUTECODETABLENAME=CTC.DBTABLENAME ,@ATTRIBUTE_IDCOLUMNNAME= case when AC.ONLYALLOWONEPERRECORD = 1 then 'ID' else 'PARENTID' end ,@ATTRIBUTEVALUE_COLUMNNAME= case when AC.DATATYPECODE = '4' then 'BOOLEANCODE' when AC.DATATYPECODE = '5' then CTC.DBTABLENAME + 'ID' when AC.DATATYPECODE = '6' then 'CONSTITUENTVALUEID' else 'VALUE' end ,@ATTRIBUTEVALUE_XLATE= case when AC.DATATYPECODE = '4' then 'BOOLEANCODE' when AC.DATATYPECODE = '5' then '(select DESCRIPTION from '+CTC.DBTABLENAME+' where ID = ' + CTC.DBTABLENAME + 'ID'+')' when AC.DATATYPECODE = '6' then '(select NAME from dbo.CONSTITUENT where ID = CONSTITUENTVALUEID)' else 'VALUE' end ,@ATTRIBUTE_DATATYPE= case when AC.DATATYPECODE = '0' then 'nvarchar(max)' when AC.DATATYPECODE = '1' then 'int' when AC.DATATYPECODE = '2' then 'datetime' when AC.DATATYPECODE = '3' then 'money' when AC.DATATYPECODE = '4' then 'bit' when AC.DATATYPECODE = '5' then 'uniqueidentifier' when AC.DATATYPECODE = '6' then 'uniqueidentifier' when AC.DATATYPECODE = '7' then 'UDT_FUZZYDATE' when AC.DATATYPECODE = '8' then 'UDT_HOURMINUTE' when AC.DATATYPECODE = '9' then 'nvarchar(max)' else 'nvarchar(max)' end from ATTRIBUTECATEGORY AC inner join ATTRIBUTERECORDTYPE ART on AC.ATTRIBUTERECORDTYPEID = ART.ID inner join RECORDTYPE RT on ART.RECORDTYPEID = RT.ID inner join TABLECATALOG TC on AC.TABLECATALOGID = TC.ID left join CODETABLECATALOG CTC on AC.CODETABLECATALOGID = CTC.ID where RT.NAME = @RECORDTYPE_NAME and AC.NAME = @ATTRIBUTE_NAME
if @ONLYALLOWONE = 1 begin declare @sql nvarchar(max); set @sql = 'if exists (select 1 from ' + @ATTRIBUTETABLENAME + ' where ' + @ATTRIBUTE_IDCOLUMNNAME + ' = ''' + CAST(@ID as nvarchar(36)) + ''')' + ' update ' + @ATTRIBUTETABLENAME + ' set ' + @ATTRIBUTEVALUE_COLUMNNAME + ' = CAST(''' + @ATTRIBUTE_VALUE + ''' as ' + @ATTRIBUTE_DATATYPE + ') where ' + @ATTRIBUTE_IDCOLUMNNAME + ' = ''' + CAST(@ID as nvarchar(36)) + '''' + ' else insert into ' + @ATTRIBUTETABLENAME + '(ID,COMMENT,STARTDATE,ENDDATE,ADDEDBYID,CHANGEDBYID,DATEADDED,DATECHANGED,'+ @ATTRIBUTEVALUE_COLUMNNAME + ') values ('''+CAST(@ID as nvarchar(36))+''''+','''',null,null,@CHANGEAGENTID, @CHANGEAGENTID,getdate(),getdate(),CAST(''' + @ATTRIBUTE_VALUE + ''' as ' + @ATTRIBUTE_DATATYPE + ')' + ')' select @sql exec sp_executesql @sql, N'@CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier', @CHANGEAGENTID end
end
